caption: Absolutely love Magic Mix. Their team is friendly and their food is amazing. Everything I have ever ordered is fresh, filling, healthy, and tastes great. I just subscribed to their meal plan and couldn’t be more excited. Highly recommended.
Best acai place
Very good smoothies and such friendly staff ❤️ will def come back here!

Best cleanses when you don't just want juice. You never have that crazy hangry feeling mid-cleanse. Their cafe menu is delicious. And the customer service is incredible. Any hiccups I've ever had with an order is answered quickly and fixed. Appreciate this place!

I can honestly say that I can't love this Juicery anymore than I already do. I tried the 5 day juice cleanse and I really felt the difference in my overall gut health and inflammation especially. I love that the cleanse consisted of both juices and soups, helping me stay consistent unlike other cleanses. I'm not a health nut either so I'm very particular with taste, and I was sooo satisfied with how everything tasted. I was definitely left wanting more & will be back!
Made me a custom smoothie per taste, no fuss, very helpful and quick

Amazing. The team at Magic Mix is like fam. Legit organic fresh vegetables & fruits. This is important as I caught another business passing #4 (conventionally grown) fruit off as #9 organic! And nothing but freshly made at MM. I highly recommend MM.
I love juice bars, and this one is my favorite. They always have great music playing and the staff is the best. I recommend you to try it out.

Can’t really understand this place...  1 small location and it’s in Financial District (not a highly residential area). But...  The customer service is unmatched in the city, the product is the best of any “juice bar”-style business in the city, and above all, the brand has an enormous reach. It’s amazing how many people know about this operation - it’s truly a hallmark business of the Financial District.  Read up on Jil Larsen’s story. I love supporting this place and its incredible employees. I’m not sure if it’s taking a hit from the current state of business affairs, but you wouldn’t be able to tell from the new products they regularly introduce.  This is not another NYC juicery...Will always be a customer here.
I love this place! Delicious foods and juices and the staff are ALWAYS helpful and friendly. The one cashier, he basically knows me by now, I love coming here 🤗
My favorite juice bar in New York! Fresh high quality juices and smoothies, delicious food, and excellent customer service are why I keep coming back <3
Smoothies are amazing here!!!!
Greatly disappointed to discover they no longer offer the raw pies. WHY?!?! Left empty handed.

I went in to purchase a simple drink. After waiting at the cash register and being ignored I asked if someone could assist me. The woman came, kept her head down, didnt speak and never looked me in my eyes despite my efforts to engage. I then had to request for my item to be placed into a bag. As soon as it was she lifted her head up to address the next customer by greeting him with a smile and a warm greeting. Never returning again. Piss poor customer service!
This is my go-to juice spot in the neighborhood. They make everything fresh right in front of you and I haven’t tried one thing from Magic Mix that isn’t amazing.

The food is simple vegan and healthy, great grab and go for a lite lunch but customer service wasn’t a winner for me. The girl was on her phone the whole time and forgot my latte until I finished eating my lunch I had to ask for it to go.

The woman behind the cointer wasn't helpful nor friendly.... We are out of town visiting here and trip planned for a while now and we were told about this place with big expectations the woman was very rude to us and kind of left us in an award position the we will rock you Acai bowl and it was very watery plus the scary spice juice  wasnt blended or juiced right there were chunks in the juice i wouldnt mind chunks in my smoothie but not my juice i dont want to chew and drink amd JUICE

It’s the perfect little spot with tons of healthy food options for anyone (GF, vegan, raw etc.)  I’m always amazed with the items I try, love the atmosphere and the staff are always beyond friendly and helpful with on point recommendations!
Top-tier option for vegan drinks and eats in Fidi
The best juice bar in NYC!

Got the hangover helper (WOW, yum) the “That’s A Wrap” (also surprisingly more delicious than it looks) and the “Tuna” Snack Pack. Everything was soooo tasty and healthy! Worth the price. Service was very helpful as well!
Great product. Costly.
Great spot, great staff!
Very good 👍👌👌😊
One might be tempted to mock this pricey juice, but it's worth it. Their hangover juice is some next level stuff. Would gladly buy again.
Raw, vegan, delicious....♥️

I guess it wasn’t my lucky day after reading good reviews on this place. But the employees need to be trained on how to make an açaí bowl. They gave me something so soupy that I did not enjoy at all. It sucks paying over $10 for something that’s not even worth it.
It felt like the best of LA in New York. Fresh, clean and healthy.

Their juices and smoothies are organic, and come in both classic and fun/unique flavors. Raw cheesecakes are creamy and sweet. Quality has been consistently good for years. Seating area is tiny, but you can usually snag a chair or stool. Go at happy hour for 1/2 price smoothies!!!

I’m so impressed with everything this place has offered me. I’m returning from Bikram Yoga from CareYoga and found this amazing Vegan, Organic, plant based food store MagicMax.us I’m a Heartfulness practitioner and I’m eating this awesome delicious satvic food as if I’m in some Ashram or consecrated place where food is prepared consciously and serving consciously. I ordered Avocado Asian Chopped Salas, Endurance Date Balls & Protein Packed Breakfast Bowl... everything is top quality. Great atmosphere and superb service!

This. Place. Is. Perfect.  First let's discuss personal health. Not only are the drinks here awesome and actually filling, they have a selection of vegan products that I can't find anywhere else (that vegan cheese, though :P). They have whole food snacks that are perfect portions and massive amounts of flavor. I always try to get a few before I travel since they're so convenient. I love the amount of options and just coming by see if there are any new options.  Next, the earth's health. The owner is committed to sustainability in her sourcing, packaging, and in the location being powered by wind itself! It's awesome to be a part of that and support Magic Mix in its initiatives
Very healthy!

Really great. The healthy shots make you feel well almost instantly.  The only suggestion I would give is for the owner to improve the quality of the cleaning tools that the staff uses. I was there around 6pm (Saturday) when the store was closing and the staff was using a broom which clearly needed to be replaced and a broken dustpan. If the owner replaced these instruments, the staff could close up the store in less time and spend more time helping customers at the end of the day.
Wonderful plant-based restaurant. Great atmosphere, awesome food and genuine staff! Highly recommend!

Wish I could give an actual review about their products but since they told me they were only serving what was in the fridge because they closed in 45 MINUTES, I didnt have the chance to try anything. Like what was the point of being opened then?!
Popular smoothie and juice spot.

I love the place, it has always been very cozy and clean, I have years coming here and they always have new foods and drinks, they always have the best attention to the requests of the people and the best advice for those who do not know much about this kind of healthy life, always recommended for healthy food and drinks, chill and have a nice time.
I was feeling under the weather, and these juices totally boost my immune system. Also super nice people working there. I’ll go regularly!
Great Smoothies, Bowls and a lot of healthy options which are very delicious. Incredible how food can be healthy but still taste so great. I definitely would recommend this place!
Great salads 👍👍👍👍and juice

I love the owner, Jil. The space. Her blends. Her food, her philosophy. EVERY city should have a Magic Mix Juicery! Let the healthy yummy healing begin worldwide. We are what we eat, and it can and SHOULD taste good!
Acai bowl was good. Mayan Smoothie was watery.
I had the greek salad which was delicious and the lentil chili. I have yet to bite into my slice of pie, but so far so good. I'll be back.

Delicious and healthy soup, excellent salad and breakfast especially the Blueberry Chia Seed Bowl. I order for lunch all the time and they are fast and friendly. Once I had a delivery get delayed and they set it right in a very kind and reasonable way. Really, really good.

Not impressed with the food. I got magic marinara pasta with meatballs and split pea soup. Soup was okay but the pasta was very small and the meatballs were on a drier side. Considering the meal cost me $18, I would expect portions to be larger or at least the food to taste better.

Nice staff but their açaí bowl selection is odd and overly sweet.  I went in at 7:45 pm on a Tuesday and ordered the “*Rock*” bowl or something like that. Not only was it underfilled, they just served me one from the fridge that was already pre made since they were too busy with online orders. For $10.50, this was a total rip off.  Save your money and go to Pure Green.
Great juices, and healthy salads but way over priced!
Great smoothies, great combinations, all natural and no added sugars. A smoothie will set you back $10 but if you need an energy boost it’s worth it.
The Best Place
My fav lunch spot
Raw greatness on the run 🥒🍍🥕

obsessed with this place, such a great quality and full in flavor with the most healthy ingredients , and the staff always welcome you with a smile and good vibes, and since I been eating there I been reaching my healthy goals
I love this fresh, clean option amidst the kinda junky lunch spots in the neighborhood. True it's not cheap but that's because the quality is extremely high.
I ordered an açai bowl, waited 10 minutes but it was worth it! Extremely delicious!! It's a bit pricey, one bowl is $11.

Most of the staff is amazing.  Their selection though is a bit odd and overly sweet.  I had a terrible experience with the blonde woman who works there.  I called in a acai order and it still took them 20 minutes plus.  Something was off with their chartreuse juice and this woman made a big fuss about letting me get something else.  Given that I go there every day, she could have been more accommodating.
Fresh and healthy.  Nice smoothies and nutritive bowls that guides you to a life full of well-being
Great products! I enjoyed my smoothie.
Cool space and good vegan snacks and juices.
It's magic

Not only is the place super adorable, the juices are SO freakin fresh. You can literally taste it. I've only been here once and I went with my mom, she loved it too and she's not even vegan! We ended up finishing each other's meals. Totally coming out here again
This place had a good atmosphere,  come in get what you want and they explain to tou what they are serving
Juices, smoothies, bowls, and some soups/lentil bowls. Very awesome.
Tasty smoothies but a tad pricey.

The juices are great, though kind of expensive as everything else in Manhattan. They also had some very interesting tea mixes. I had the "horsepower" with yerba mate, and it was great. The guys at the counter are very friendly and seemed to be enjoying what they do. Great music too.
(Translated by Google) Good variety of natural games.  (Original) Buena variedad de juegos naturales.
I love the fresh take on smoothies and  juices. But expect to pay for it!
I've seen this place for years but have never stepped foot in until recently. Came in and tried the Thai salad and was definitely pleased with the freshness and quality ingredients.
Love this place. One of the few, truly healthy places around. Excellent drinks, extremely healthy and not overly priced either.
Expansive AF and the dishes are tiny but at least they are raw and vegan and have good gluten free options.
Gets you going! 😎😎😎

(Translated by Google) Chicken PARM, or MeatZa, easy to feed 4. This is not the star of the night, so skip this and sausage and pepper toast because there are better things to offer on the menu. The chopped salad in Yellowtail Kru and the amazing New York Italy are my favorites. Eggplant polpette is delicious, but what is good for making eggplant, right? For everyone's corn lovers, not only that, for your food lovers, corn creme pudding is a given. For the desert, we order three types of ice cream. Like MeatZa, a ball is more than enough to support a family of four. If you want to get only one flavor, go for a solid dinner with whey, but I prefer the quality of the meat in this sister restaurant.  (Original) 雞PARM，或MeatZa，容易飼料4.這是不是夜晚的明星，所以跳過這和香腸和辣椒烤麵包，因為菜單上有更好的東西來提供。在黃尾克魯和令人驚訝的紐約意大利切碎的沙拉都是我的最愛。茄子polpette很美味，但做的茄子有什麼是好的，對吧？對於大家的玉米愛好者，不僅如此，對於你的美食愛好者，玉米焦糖布丁是一個給定。對於沙漠，我們訂購三種冰淇淋的。像MeatZa，一球是綽綽有餘養活四口人。如果你要得到只有一種口味，去與乳清，固體晚餐，但我更喜歡肉的質量在這個姐妹餐廳。
Pretty pricey food and juice options. Did a 3 day all green juice cleanse here. It was intense but pretty good except for one variety.

I just stopped in for a midday snack and landed on the Lady Godiva with raw cacao and goji berries. WOW. I'm in love with being vegan all over again. I had a lovely experience here overall and I will be back, a lot!! Very happy to have discovered this place!
$10 juices, good, but $10
Delicious and cute. Definitely worth a try. Employees are helpful!

This place is amazing. I definitely plan to purchase the Detox package. The painkiller juice was refreshing and had a little kick to it which was awesome. I also love that they deliver to the financial district for free!!!

Overpriced, too complicated. You need a PhD in juice-making to order here. Went in looking for a green juice with some fruit in it, was not possible because apparently they don't have any vegetables other than Kale? They don't even have an organized list of available ingredients. Had to leave empty handed.
I love this place!! I go here mostly everyday! The employees are very friendly and helpful! Juices are amazing! MUST TRY the hangover helper! it works wonders!!
